name: SNAudioFileAnalyzer
desc: An analyzer that runs sound classification requests on an audio file.

items.name: init(url: URL)
items.desc: Creates a new audio file analyzer.

items.name: func add(SNRequest, withObserver: SNResultsObserving)
items.desc: Adds a new analysis request to the audio file analyzer.

items.name: protocol SNRequest
items.desc: A protocol that represents sound analysis requests.

items.name: protocol SNResultsObserving
items.desc: The interface your app implements to receive the results of an analysis request.

items.name: func remove(SNRequest)
items.desc: Removes an existing request from the audio file analyzer.

items.name: func removeAllRequests()
items.desc: Removes all the sound analysis requests from the audio file analyzer.

items.name: func cancelAnalysis()
items.desc: Cancels all the asynchronous sound analysis requests the analyzer is currently processing.
